__e: I want you to know, he couldn't hurt me.
Someplace they can't bother you no more.
Once you're married, he won't be able to hurt us.
Whatever spell the witch put on these woods, you have to be out here at night for it to get you.
You have to be hard now, hard so nothing can ever touch us.
It's probably some old biddy talkin' about stuff she don't know, but maybe you should go back and check with the family, see if we don't get took on this, huh?
